text: Ani tumhi manapasuna iccha keli tarihi patnincya daramyana kadhihi n'yaya karu sakanara nahita. Yastava tumhi (ekicyacakade) purnapane na jhukave ki dusarila adhara lombakalata soduna dyave ani jara tumhi sudharana karuna ghyala, ani (an'yaya karanyapasuna) svatahla vacavala tara khatrine allaha motha mapha karanara, daya karanara ahe
